definition: habitually do something or be in a certan state or place (use only in the past tense); "She used to call her mother every week but now she calls only occasionally"; "I used to get sick when I ate in that dining hall"; "They used to vacation in the Bahamas"; "she used to be his best friend and now they are enemies"

subcats: They %s the car down the avenue
They %s the bags on the table
His fields %s mine at this point

subject: verb.social
